member.name: P:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.Configuration.MessageRetentionTime
member.summary: Retention time of messages in the message queue in seconds. Default: 10, minimum: 2

member.name: P:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.Configuration.MessageProcessorThreadCount
member.summary: Number of message processor threads. Default is 3.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.Configuration.MessageProcessorThreadMaxMessages
member.summary: Max number of messages processed by a single message processor thread. Default is 100.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.Configuration.MsmqReconnectDelay
member.summary: Defines the time interval between reconnect attempts (in seconds). Default value: 30 sec.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.MsmqMessageProvider
member.summary: IMessageProvider implementation on top of MSMQ.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Security.Messaging.Msmq.MsmqMessageProvider.IncomingMessageCount
member.summary: Returns the count of unprocessed incoming messages. Slowing down the producing of messages maybe necessary if it exceeds a certain amount.
